synonyms.synonym: Alkylated DNA repair protein alkB homolog 3

protein.specific_function: Dioxygenase that repairs alkylated DNA containing 1- methyladenine and 3-methylcytosine by oxidative demethylation. Has a strong preference for single-stranded DNA. May also act on RNA. Requires molecular oxygen, alpha-ketoglutarate and iron
